subject: Travel
title: The Boeing 747: Queen of the Skies
description: One-minute skill: The Boeing 747: Queen of the Skies.

hook.text: When Boeing unveiled the 747, it was so large that they had to build a new factory just to make it.

buildup.text: Pan Am ordered 25 in 1966. Boeing bet the entire company on the project â€” failure meant bankruptcy.

discovery.text: The 747 could carry 400 passengers. It cut ticket prices and made international travel affordable.

twist.text: The famous upper deck hump was originally for cargo. Airlines turned it into a first-class lounge.

climax.text: It flew for over 50 years. The last commercial 747 was retired in 2023.

punchline.text: One plane made the whole world reachable.

quiz.question: Why was the Boeing 747's upper deck hump originally designed?
